name: Simple-Breakout
body:
# Simple-Breakout
Hello there!
I don't know how you found this page but since you are already here, I guess you want to know what this Site is about.
  
Well, this Site is about a classic Breakout Styled Game I'm working on. On this Site you will find Information regarding this Project as well as Status Updates.

***

A (hopefully) playable build of this game is downloadable in the [Releases Section](https://github.com/kartoffelx86/Simple-Breakout/releases).

## To-Do:
- [x] Make a working game
- [ ] Rework all Graphics
- [ ] Add Multiplayer

:new_moon_with_face:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
